title: 115A.70 DESIGNATING RESOURCE RECOVERY FACILITIES.
text:
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
[Repealed, 1984 c 644 s 82]
A waste management district possessing designation authority in its articles of incorporation may be authorized to designate a resource recovery facility under sections 115A.80 to 115A.89.
